pkgmetadata.longdescription: mds-pim-memos=============Tryton module to store memos.Memos are only visible to the owner.Categories can be assigned to the memos.Install=======pip install mds-pim-memosRequires========- Tryton 6.0Changes=======*6.0.8 - 09.02.2023*- fix: report encoding*6.0.7 - 09.02.2023*- updt: optimize report for html/pdf*6.0.6 - 01.02.2023*- updt: field 'memo' --> richtext*6.0.5 - 15.12.2021*- updt: translations*6.0.4 - 15.12.2021*- updt: compatibility to Tryton 6.0
